ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, RecordType.Name = 'Interfaced', OR( ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Reference_Date__c ) , ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Payment_Anchor__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Payment Anchor and/or Reference Date cannot be changed.
